title: Change attack button
body: since my A key is broken anybody knows how to change that target button ?

replies.body:
RIP **A** Button </3

You can change which key you use for attack-move under the **HOTKEYS** section of your in-game settings. Hit **ESC**, then select **Player Movement** and change your *Player Attack Move* setting to whichever key you want, then hit **Okay**. Below is a screenshot to visually assist you.

(Click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/uljh6

Let me know if this helped! :)
rip :( let me try thanks for the help <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
